00009 CommandPerformSearch::CommandPerformSearch(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager, const std::vector<std::string>& translations_to_search, std::string search_string, int search_option) :
00010     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00011     m_translations_to_search(translations_to_search),
00012     m_search_query(new SearchResultsSerial(search_string)),
00013     m_search_option(search_option)

00015 }
00016 
00017 void CommandPerformSearch::Execute()
00018 {
00019     for (TranslationIterator translation = m_translation_manager->begin(); translation != m_translation_manager->end(); ++translation)
00020     {
00021         if (std::find(m_translations_to_search.begin(), m_translations_to_search.end(), (*translation)->get_short_name()) != m_translations_to_search.end())
00022         {
00023             (*translation)->search(m_search_query, m_search_option);
00024         }
00025     }
00026 }
00027 
00028 boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> CommandPerformSearch::get_results()
00029 {
00030     return m_search_query;
00031 }
